reviewText: Loved the show as a kid and now my little girl loves it!
My son enjoyed watching Inspector Gadget when he was growing up and I wanted his sons to enjoy him too. I was happy to find this dvd.

In the episode "Don't Hold Your Breath" the sound cuts out. Picture quality poor: Colors look faded and there are lines on brighter colors. As for the show itself: Very dull not really funny and repetitive. Show this to kids if you want to they might like it, but might outgrow it really fast.

This 3 Disc DVD set contains 22 episodes from Season 1 of the classic Inspector Gadget cartoon. Amazon doesn't always do a good job on their DVD episode listings so here are the episodes that are included in this DVD set:

1. Gadget's Replacement
2. Greenfinger
3. Gadget Goes West
4. Launch Time
5. Photo Safari (Black Devil)
6. The Coo-Coo-Clock Caper
7. Bermuda Triangle
8. The Japanese Connection
9. Arabian Nights
10. Clear Case
11. Dutch Treat
12. Great Divide
13. Eye of the Dragon
14. Double Agent
15. Plantform of the Opera
16. Don't Hold Your Breath
17. Gone Went the Wind
18. King Wrong
19. Pirate Island
20. M.A.D. Academy
21. No Flies On Us
22. Luck of the Irish
Not as good as I remembered from watching it many years ago!! However, it does have the great Don Adams in it!!
My son loves Inspector Gadget movies. This DVD will join his collection.

The grandkids love to watch these when they're here.  The quality of the DVDs is fine (good sound and picture).  The shows are good for kids.  Kind of silly but in a fun way, from an old lady's perspective, but there is nothing harmful for kids here.
This is the old, beloved TV series.  Great.
These were the best and funniest cartoons of the late 80's! My son loves them just as much as I do!
Was thrilled to share this favorite of my kids with my grandchildren.  Much, much better than the newer version.
My almost 8 year old daughter just loves the Inspector Gadget cartoons, and so do I.
